channel.title: Halo: The movie
channel.description: I used to play Halo with my friends, but for the first time, I got it for myself (PC), and it has an awesome storyline. Now I understand why it's called Halo (waits to be flamed). So, I figured that would make a very good movie, so I googled "halo movie". So, theres an actual Halo movie coming out in 2008. I know most of you probably knew that, but it's news to me. I can't wait to see it. How good do you think it will be?

item.dc:creator: @bumr055 bumr055
item.description:
@bumr055 wrote:

i only played a bit of campaign for halo2 and when i got an xbox halo2 way already out. the reason i got it so late was because i was anti xbox and loved ps2. not i cant play campaign because my disk is mashed and i didnt copy those maps onto my hdd, so i just pwn0riznorz ppl on xbc and xlink when im at ppls house that arent banned.

sometimes the maps get boring so i download map packs like memisis or killtacular those are good and there not pwnz0r maps that have autoaim jump high or any of that gayness.

i have halo1 on my hdd but ive only playd it online with xbc.

item.title: Halo: The movie
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

ghostboy195:

Damn, my dad won’t let me get Halo for the PC even tho i’ve played Halo 2 at my friends house. My Dad even played it and liked it and said if i ever got an Xbox that was a game we were going to get

When my Dad bought me an Xbox for Xmas it came with Halo. We both learnt how to play it together. Then i had to go to Queensland the next day. When i came back my Dad had finished the game. Darn him.

So when he went back to his house he bought his own Xbox and Halo. Then when Halo 2 came out he pre-ordered it. We raced to see who would finish and of course, i did. (Mwuaha).

Then he left for Papu New Guine and i have 2 Xbox’s, 2 Halo’s and 2 Halo 2’s lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Halo: The movie
item.dc:creator: @wyn10 wyn10
item.description:
@wyn10 wrote:

Zach1188:

Um, sorry to be the noob of Halo, but who is Spartin/MC?

the mc is the master chief as the convenant call him the “demon” cause of all the stuff he has done, the master cheif is the last spartan and of all of the spartans who have died on reach or another place. The master cheifs armour is the most advanced out there and similar to the elites armour because of there “sheild”. So the human are having a war with the convenat after they found them and been having the war for a decade or so. The covenat have been winning so far are the human are kinda of in this corner sumwut trying to break free and are trying to beat the covenant so the war could get over.

im on a roll so im going to keep going

the humans that are in the war were upducted from there parents from earth and they have been replaced from clones and as the war keep going they keeped getting some what toddlers and replacing them so they get to train them for about 10 or 15 years then taking them to the war. Some of those humans have gotten promated to they call spartans, it was a experiment that they tryed for the best armour. The armour moved by the persons thought of they wanted to do, but only some of the people got to experice because people keep dieing from the speed the suits ran so they would have a somwut a brain function and die. Since the fall of reach and so forth, there is only one spartan left and that is why they call him the master cheif.

Since i told about the mc im going to tell about the Arbitor
The arbitor was in charged for the first halo witch was the first game, the aribtor was in charge of all the covenat on the halo and was in charged of killing the master cheif but they failed. Since of the fall of the halo ring the prophets (the aliens, almost like kings) turned him into the aribitor a somewhat sucidal person that had objectives that were some what possible. The aribitor as done wut the prophets have wanted and still doing, mean while the brutes (almost like a hairy gorrila) have been having a war with the covenent beacuae they thought the aribitor should have died because they thought he was really a heritic (sumbody that doesnt believe in war).

So far the covenate found sumthing that were scared of and that was the flood, a sumwut messy 3 forms they have, one is a jeely fish that go and find bodies and connected to there brain stem to bring them back alive but the jeely thing is controlling it, next is a blody sume what like a trasporting thing that transports flood by bloating up the head (a flood does this) and trasports other floods with him and a combat form whitch is a guy ( human or convenat elite) and attacks you and does wut the flood whats to do and they dont feel pain.

So they found out these some what forrunners have made these rings to keep the flood in a place so they wont get out of hand. We dont know what the forerunners are but looking forward to seeing thme possibly in halo 3.

god this is the longest post i have ever done and i hoped this helped

Read full topic
